description: Mindshare is designed to help individuals who are facing the turmoil of isolation. Unlike social media where all your entries are at the scrutiny and judgment of your family, friends, and peers. Mindshare is meant to be a safe place where you can make meaningful inputs and track your mood and feelings over a time period.

Google Book Search is the ultimate library application where users are able to search for a book of their choice. The application uses the Google Books API. Users can see the book title, authors, image, description and a view more button. Users are able to save their favorite books and using Socket.IO a notification will appear.

Let’s Go Travel Planner is a travel app that helps users plan their trips effortlessly. The app lets users input the name of the city that they would like to travel to. Whenever a user submits a city name, the app will display a list of recommendations for restaurants and activities to do in the city. Users will also be able to save itineraries.

Test your coding knowledge by taking the quiz and saving your high score. The quiz has a built-in countdown timer, so the user must answer correctly within the time frame. The user can only proceed to the next question if they have answered the present question correctly. At the end of the quiz the user is able to save their score.

With the Password Generator, users are able to create a safe and secure password within their criteria needs. Users are able to choose a password length between 8 and 128 numerical characters long. Validations have been incorporated to ensure that a password is generated based on the application and user needs.

The Weather Dashboard application is the go-to website for your 5-day forecast. With an elegant look and user-friendly interface, users are able to search for their city of choice. Using the Open Weather Map API, we are able to retrieve the weather data for the temperature, humidity, wind speed, UV index, and weather icons.

Work Day Scheduler is the app to organize your busy schedule. Users are able to input tasks from 9am – 5pm and it is designed to align with business hours. Past time is represented by the color grey. The present hour is red and future hours are displayed in green. Within present and future, the user is able to input their tasks.

The Professional Readme Generator allows users to quickly and sufficiently create readme templates. The user will be asked a series of questions in which the user can tailor to their specific needs. Using Node.js and Inquirer, we are able to make use of the terminal’s CLI and generate the questions and answers needed.

Employee Summary is for employers to easily input their employee information. Using Node.js and Inquirer the employer is asked whether the employee is a manager, engineer or a student intern. They will then be able to enter the employees name, id, email and GitHub username. Once complete a HTML file will be generated.

Note Taker is the simple solution to having an interactive notepad! With this application, users are able to swiftly enter their note title followed by the note description. With an easy to navigate user interface, the user will then see the save button appear in the navbar once the note has met submission requirements.

The Employee Tracker system is a must have for any organization to keep track of their staff, departments, managers, allocated budgets and employee salaries. This is a full CRUD application. Meaning, employers are able to Create, Read, Update and Delete entries that are saved into the database.

Eat-Da-Burger provides users with a safe haven where they will be able to stack burgers ready for consumption. Simply enter your desired burger of choice and watch it dynamically be placed ready to be devoured list! When the user is ready, they click the devour button, which then will place the burger in the devoured list.

Workout Tracker enables a user to add workouts as a part of their daily schedule. With this application, users are able to add new exercises and view their stats using the built-in dashboard. All entries are stored into the MongoDB database using Mongoose. The data is then retrieved and displayed back to the user.

Budget Tracker allows users to keep track of their incoming and outgoing transactions! The application updates the user’s budget in real time whenever a transaction is submitted. It also has the capability to run offline so users do not need to worry if they lose connection. The data will be stored in IndexedDB until the user has online access.

Employee Directory is a simulated application that uses an API call when the page is loaded to render a list of 20 random users. The user is able to see an image, name, phone number, email address, and date of birth. Using the search input field, users are able to filter specific names and the application sorts in real time.
